attributes.action: Parliament must vote to decide if Article 50 should be invoked.
attributes.background: Many people regret their leave vote. The result was very close. Many people feel misled and now wish to change their vote to remain. Many people wanted to register a protest vote and did not realise the consequences. MPs in a parliamentary democracy are best placed to make these complex decisions.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
